title: Group Kayaking
body: The Santa Barbara coastline offers incredible views of the American Riviera by kayak. Captain Jack’s Tours offers a 2 hour harbor kayak tour (also available as a sunset champagne tour), a 3 hour coastal tour, and a spectacular 2 hour paddle at the famous “Smuggler’s Cove”. We use extra wide oversized kayaks to ensure the most comfortable and safe ride possible. All tours include life vests, paddles and a kayak orientation / lesson. This tour is great for kids and adults alike, and no kayaking experience is necessary. Wwe can accommodate 40 people at a time or two groups of 40 back to back for a maximum of 80 people. Start times are flexible for large groups, please call us to discuss the details.
